site_description: A work-in-progress static website template from Viv Barakat, Lumina Web Solutions Ltd. Built with Eleventy to run in the CloudCannon environment.

image_optimisation.comment: Optimisation used on the Production site (when processEnv.environment == 'production' in liquid template).

imagekit_url.comment: Leave blank if using another option for image optimisation.

recaptcha_key.label: reCAPTCHA Site Key
recaptcha_key.comment: Enter your Google reCAPTCHA Site Key to enable reCAPTCHA on your forms.
